item.title: Steampunk Tavern & Inn
item.description: Original State Source: 1.19 SMP concluding 18/05/22 Builder: Nicolas Aguayo Perez (blaze_mex) ![[nico_house_og.png]] Current State Current Coordinates: -1600, 250 History The Steampunk Tavern & Inn, built by Nicolas, was first established in the early days of Minecraftia.
